ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes, I would definitely recommend the course to anyone willing to learn more about neurological diseases. The seminars are interesting, and students get to research a particular disorder.
Recommend if you are interested in pursuing neurology.
I loved this course and would recommend it to anyone interested in Neuroscience, both within and outside the Department.

Unless there's a major overhaul of the class its probably not worth students time. Its a high level survey which could be useful but its not that engaging and I didn't feel like it expanded my understanding.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course definitely opened my eyes to a lot of different areas of neurology. I have always been interested in going into that field, but after this class I am certain that I want to work in this field.

Absolutely. It assisted me with my Master's thesis and research. I hope to pursue a PhD related to Neuroscience/Neurology and the course reinforced this desire. By reigniting a passion for Neuro, I found the class to be a great success in regards to my future career plans.
